metadata.name: The House #01 / stairs house
metadata.description:
3D architectural NFT art
The House #01 which is the first edition from the “3D Metaverse Beyond Architecture” collection . 
You can pinch and rotate it for yourself.

“Architecture” could be a monument, a sculpture, even a snow globe to appreciate in your smart phone and your PC with an eternity digital data.

Imagine when people live in Metaverse, “Stairs House” shows how the resident live in and how each room and green connected around. Maybe there are no gravity, no axis, but I believe there are the soul and mutual cooperation which inherent in human being DNA.
